strings: The command 'achievements' also shows the total number of achievements.
There is a 'poem' command that prints a poem to the screen.
Use the 'wiki' command to browse the in-game wiki and to better understand the world of Dungeon.
You can filter the output of the 'commands' command by typing the beginning of the command.
Try to fight bats out in the open during daytime.
Orcs become enraged when they are hurt and land several easy critical hits, kill them as fast as you can.
